metadata.name: Fracture, Vol. 2
metadata.description: Life has been good in Lower Triton since the events of FRACTURE Volume 1.  Jeff has suppressed his fractures, taking both the villainous Malice and the heroic Virtue off the table.  But the city still has a hero in...Virtue?!  Which villain is looking to fill Malice's shoes?  New heroes!  New villains!  New Fractures!
